name: Youth Programs
description: TI Sailing center offers four sailing courses for beginners to advanced youth under the Progression Program. Harbor Seals is an Introduction to Sailing course for 6-7 year olds. No experience is required. The second course is Beginners Sailing for Youth (8-12) and Teen (13-17) classes available. Following is the Intermediate course for Youth (8-12) and Teen (13-17) and the Advanced class for Youth (8-12). Sailors must be able to perform the Beginner Graduation Sail to be eligible for the Advance

howToGetIt: Visit https://www.tisailing.org/progression/ to register for classes.
